title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, there are multiple redraws occurring instead of just one for each visible line.
EB: This issue should be fixed so that there is at a maximum only one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Add the following line to the 'performPaint' method in StyledText:
   System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
2. Run the test case below to see the redraws occurring.
